name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Lamarr SISTRUNK, Respondent

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Lamarr SISTRUNK, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 27th day of February, 2008, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED, the order of the Superior Court is VACATED, and the case REMANDED to the trial court for reinstatement of the jury’s verdict. See Commonwealth v. Ratsamy, 934 A.2d 1233 (Pa.2007).
Jurisdiction relinquished.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
942 A.2d 896
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Lamarr SISTRUNK, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 27, 2008.
